title: Software Consultant - Frontend - Kirey Group
descriptions:
Software consultant in banking sector at Unicredit.

Frontend Developer.

Credit Process Simplification. Simplification and digitalization of manual processes.
Remote position in an international context working with Agile methodology, with regular work trip abroad at the client.
Development of an application to gather information from the customers for credit process.

In addition to code development, I had active roles throughout the development cycle and application ideation within the team including:
- Leading the daily meeting (Agile)
- Close contact with the business to define and estimate user stories
- Defining technical solutions
- Technical planning and analysis in direct contact with business analysts and the technical leader
- Testing and bugfixes
- Mentoring of junior/medior colleagues side-by-side
- Code review
- Versioning of code for CI/CD

The technologies I used in this project were mainly React, Jest, OpenAPI Specification (Swagger), Postman, Vite.js, and Storybook.
In addition to the latter, I also had opportunities to take part in activities that required the use and knowledge of Jenkins, Docker, nginx, Spring-boot, Liquibase (SQL), Google cloud platform.

Custom React styleguide library.
Library of custom components, compliant with brand book specifications.
Set of React components, used by several internal customer projects with goal of standardizing the design of all applications.

The technical solutions used are Vite.js, Storybook and Jest.

title: Frontend developer - Planet SRL
descriptions:
Frontend Developer.

Development of Video on Demand and Live streaming solutions, with custom video player and metadata enrichment.

Development of public portals dedicated to end users, management development that interfaces with backend APIs for content management.
Development of custom video player based on video.js.
Development of API in .NET Core for data collection and analytics by querying Elastic Search.

The technologies I used were Typescript, Angular (5-12), Webpack, OpenAPI Specification (Swagger), C#, .NET Core, Elastic Search, nginx, Docker, OAuth2, Powershell, Linux, PHP, Symfony, Twig.
